attributes.action: dispense with the costly, inefficient, error prone, unfair and  socially and politically divisive taxing of income and earnings of individual citizens that provides less than 25 percent of the total tax take and instead collect all personal taxation by VAT, trading duties and other low cost indirect taxation by which all citizens from the poorest to the wealthiest contribute equitably without favour according to their expenditure and consumption of material goods and services.
